AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farm child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] younger years working on the family farm. [PAWN_possessive] family would occasionally be called on to fight off orc or beastman raids, and had a duty to the Empire to provide food for the bigger cities.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Street rat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] younger years surviving on the streets of one of the larger cities of the Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] became good at talking [PAWN_possessive] way out of trouble, but also learned to fight for times that talking wouldn't work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Abandoned child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned. [PAWN_pronoun] he was left in the wild to struggle, but somehow managed to survive long enough for a passing Empire trading caravan to pick [PAWN_objective] up.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Orphan child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an orphan. Stories go that the "Countâ€™s Men" passed by one night.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Abucted child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted in from [PAWN_possessive] home in Stirland. Rescued from the child snatcher by a group Witch Hunters, [PAWN_pronoun] was then given some basic military training while traveling with them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Accursed child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was prophesied to be a child of chaos. Struggling with life as an outcast, [PAWN_pronoun] ended up being exorcised by a priest of Sigmar.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Adventurous youth
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] longed for adventure, but [PAWN_possessive] parents were as hard headed and rigid as the rest of Stirland. One night [PAWN_pronoun] ran away from home, to find the much needed adventure.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Serf child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a serf, toiling away at the farmstead. One day [PAWN_nameDef] simply had enough; [PAWN_pronoun] dropped everthing, and walked off.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Survivor child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] survived when [PAWN_possessive] village was burned down by ravaging greenskins. [PAWN_pronoun] swore to get vengence upon not just the orcs responsible, but all orcs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Outsider child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled to Stirland as a child, with [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_pronoun] never managed to fit in with the locals, and started to dabble in more unsavory activites.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Squire child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was training as a squire to one of the knights of Stirland. The time spent around the upper echelons of society offered [PAWN_objective] valuable life experience.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Aristocrat child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came form a noble family. [PAWN_pronoun] was constanly bored by the life, and was drawn to adventure. It was that feeling that caused [PAWN_objective] to leave his home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Village child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a village in Stirland. Spending time like the rest of the children there, living in the rural backwaters.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Tilling, hoeing, guiding ox carts, purchasing seed, planning field production, managing the farm, planting seeds, and predicting the harvest. All of those things and more were [PAWN_nameDef]'s job. [PAWN_pronoun] had a duty to provide food for the Empire, and [PAWN_pronoun] never once fell short, despite the orc and beastmen raids that occurred with somewhat regular frequency.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cook for the armies of the Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] had one focus, and that was keeping the soldiers fed. That had the benefit of making sure [PAWN_pronoun] always got the best of the available food!

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Army grunt
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an Empire army grunt. [PAWN_possessive] jobs included digging latrines and fortifications, hauling whatever needed to be hauled, and occasionally weilding a spear to fight off raids.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Pick pocket
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a vagrant in a city, surviving on [PAWN_possessive] wits, with no fear of breaking the law.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Travelling actor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled with [PAWN_possessive] acting company, putting on shows and entertaining the people of the Empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Adventurer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an adventurer, lusting for fame and fortune. [PAWN_pronoun] traveled the country, and beyond; occasionally joining with others, and occasionally alone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a smithy in [PAWN_possessive] village in Nordland.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bounty hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bounty hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] sought out criminals on [PAWN_possessive] own, and marauding orcs, goblin, and occasionally skaven with a band of others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Former brigand
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a thug and a menace; [PAWN_pronoun] would prey on the weak and vulnerable.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Civil servant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a civil servant for the local lord. [PAWN_possessive] jobs included collecting taxes, ensuring arrests happened, settling minor disputes, and more.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] hunted in the local woods. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for bringing in game for the town, and [PAWN_pronoun] made a decent living doing it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Criminal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was dragged to enlist in the army of the Empire as a prisoner. It was enlistment or death, so the choice was obvious.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Scout
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a scout, [PAWN_nameDef]'s kept on lookout around [PAWN_possessive] village, to be sure there were no raids or enemies nearby.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived outside the law, smuggling goods from point A to point B, and making much gold along the way.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a hospital in Nuln. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time triaging patients, and handling cases that didn't require a doctor.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Thief
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] stole to make a living. Sneaking into the homes of knights and other nobility in order to make a living.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hermit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived as a hermit, shunning the more civilized areas of the Empire in order to live mostly alone in the wilderness.
